flawed_nl_solution:
Since, three years from now, Tabitha will have 8 different colors in her hair, this year she has 8 - 3 = <<8-3=5>>5 colors in her hair.
Since she had 2 colors in her hair at the age of 15, she has added 5-2=8 colors since she was 15 years old.
Since she ads one color per year, 8 added colors = <<8=8>>8 added years
Thus, currently, she is 15+8=<<15+8=23>>23 years old.
#### 23

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3, not 8. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
